MS MCQs

    Introduction to migrating ASP.NET apps to Azure

    »

    1. Which hosting option requires the customer to manage only the applications and data?

      PaaS

      IaaS

      SaaS


    2. What is an App Service plan?

      The App Service plan will define a set of compute resources for your ASP.NET application.

      The set of migration tools that you use to move your application to the cloud.

      The licensing agreement you select for your Azure subscription.


    3. Which component in Azure offers configuration options and benefits that are similar to a firewall?

      Azure DNS

      Azure Compute

      Azure virtual networks
